description: The People's Glorious GitHub Client's build dependencies

scripts.test:integration: cross-env TEST_ENV=1 ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE=1 mocha -t 10000 --compilers ts:ts-node/register,tsx:ts-node/register app/test/integration/*.ts
scripts.test:unit: cross-env TEST_ENV=1 ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE=1 electron-mocha -t 10000 --renderer --compilers ts:ts-node/register,tsx:ts-node/register --require ./app/test/globals.ts app/test/unit/*.ts app/test/unit/git/*.ts app/test/unit/main-process/* app/test/unit/*.tsx
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.postinstall: cd app && npm install && cd .. && git submodule update --recursive --init && npm run compile:tslint
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node script/build
scripts.build:prod: npm run compile:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node script/build
scripts.rebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm run build:dev
scripts.rebuild:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:prod
scripts.clean-slate: npm run clean && rimraf node_modules app/node_modules && npm install
scripts.rebuild-hard:dev: npm run clean-slate && npm run rebuild:dev
scripts.rebuild-hard:prod: npm run clean-slate && npm run rebuild:prod
